ygData.subject: Re: where is it?
ygData.msgSnippet: They don t sell the 16th song in Erudin.  The songs are on the first vendor to the right in the Library.  Half elves are not exactly welcome in erudin, but not
ygData.messageBody:
They don't sell the 16th song in Erudin. The songs are on the first vendor
to the right in the Library. Half elves are not exactly welcome in erudin,
but not KOS... they just give us attitude.

-----Original Message-----
From: Dalton Handy <dhandy@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 3:25 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: where is it?


>From: "Dalton Handy" <dhandy@...>
>
>Not sure about HH, but in Erudin its one of the guys in the Library.. Not
>sure which.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Joshua Owyang [mailto:owyanj01@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 3:11 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] where is it?
>
>From: Joshua Owyang <owyanj01@...>
>
>Hey can some high level bard help me out? Where is the place where they
>sell songs in Highhold? namely the level 16 song... and where do we buy
>a song in Erudin? am I (half-elf) even allowed in Erudin? Just wondering
>for future knowledge...
>
>Talian
>
